mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANNUAL_LEAVE(EMPLOYEE_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_MENU, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, MOD_MENU) VALUES(#{employeeID}, #{regId}, #{regDate}, #{regMenu}, #{modId}, #{modDate}, #{modMenu})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE h LEFT JOIN ANNUAL_LEAVE a ON h.EMPLOYEE_ID = a.EMPLOYEE_ID

SELECT h.EMPLOYEE_ID, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(DEPARTMENT_CD, 3), DEPARTMENT_CD) AS DEPARTMENT_CD_NAME, h.NAME, h.JOIN_DATE, h.QUIT_DATE, h.YEARS_OF_SERVICE, a.OCCURRENCE_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.TOTAL_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.USED_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.HAVE_ANNUAL_LEAVE FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE h LEFT JOIN ANNUAL_LEAVE a ON h.EMPLOYEE_ID = a.EMPLOYEE_ID
LIMIT #{startRow}, 10

SELECT h.EMPLOYEE_ID, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(DEPARTMENT_CD, 3), DEPARTMENT_CD) AS DEPARTMENT_CD_NAME, h.NAME, DATE_FORMAT(h.JOIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(h.QUIT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS QUIT_DATE, h.YEARS_OF_SERVICE, a.OCCURRENCE_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.TOTAL_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.USED_ANNUAL_LEAVE, a.HAVE_ANNUAL_LEAVE FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE h LEFT JOIN ANNUAL_LEAVE a ON h.EMPLOYEE_ID = a.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE DEPARTMENT_CD = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNUAL_LEAVE SET OCCURRENCE_ANNUAL_LEAVE = #{occurrenceAnnualLeave}, TOTAL_ANNUAL_LEAVE = #{totalAnnualLeave}, HAVE_ANNUAL_LEAVE = #{haveAnnualLeave} WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeID}
